arts.ttl: Italian Champions League Nightmare: Inter Shine, Milan and Juventus Falter, Atalanta Unlucky
arts.sum: The Champions League group stage has concluded with mixed fortunes for Italian clubs. Inter Milan emerged as the sole Italian representative directly qualifying for the Round of 16, finishing an impressive fourth in the overall standings. arts.ttl: Champions League: Leverkusen and Lille in top eight as Atalanta fall short
arts.sum: Atalanta slip to ninth place with 2-2 draw at Barcelona Bayern and Real Madrid also in playoffs despite wins Barcelona were held to 2-2 draw at home to Atalanta, who missed out on an automatic place in the Champions League last 16 due to results elsewhere. Lamine Yamal gave Barcelona the lead two minutes into the second half, but Éderson levelled for Atalanta 20 minutes later with a stunning effort from the edge of the area. Ronald Araújo headed home from a corner to restore Barça’s lead soon after, before Mario Pasalic levelled again for the visitors with a fine nutmegged finish. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Atalanta’s Injury Woes Mount as Scalvini and Kolasinac Exit Champions League Clash
arts.sum: In a challenging night for Atalanta, the Italian side faced not only a tough 2-2 draw against Barcelona in the Champions League but also suffered significant injury setbacks. The match at the Estadi Olimpic Lluis Companys saw two key defenders, Giorgio Scalvini and Sead Kolasinac, forced off the field due to injuries. The post Atalanta’s Injury Woes Mount as Scalvini and Kolasinac Exit Champions League Clash appeared first on FootItalia.com.

arts.sum: Barcelona couldn't defeat Atalanta and settled for a second place finish in the Champions League league phase.

arts.ttl: Barcelona 2-2 Atalanta: Highlights, man of the match, stats as Italian giants miss out on automatic qualification spot
arts.sum: Atalanta BC miss out on the chance to secure an automatic spot in the next round of the Champions League courtesy of a 2-2 draw with Barcelona.

arts.ttl: Champions League | Barcelona 2-2 Atalanta: Match Report
arts.sum: In a thrilling Champions League encounter, Atalanta twice came from behind to earn a 2-2 draw against Barcelona at the Camp Nou. Despite the impressive result, the Italian side narrowly missed out on a top-eight finish, which would have guaranteed them a spot in the Round of 16.
